humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that 7/7 regional lymph nodes are positive for metastasis. Based on the new rule 13, N3 indicates metastases in 4 or more axillary lymph nodes, or in in-transit, satellite, or micrometastases in 4 or more lymph nodes, or in ipsilateral internal mammary lymph nodes in the absence of axillary lymph node metastases. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N3.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has 7/7 regional lymph nodes positive for metastasis, which corresponds to an N3 stage. The report does not mention extracapsular invasion, but the number of positive lymph nodes is sufficient to determine the N stage.
